name: Alien 3: Isolated
description:
I really enjoyed Alien 3 on the Mega Drive back in the day and since I've been making games as a hobby I figured I'd make a love letter to both that game and the Alien franchise itself.  Depending on the reaction to this I may go back and add some more features I, such as inventory management, rescuing prisoners and of course more of a narrative setting rather than the simple references I'm using here.

Should work with most controllers

Shoulder buttons cycle weapons

Sometimes it's better to run away from the aliens rather than trying to kill them all ;-)
